price: 78. (Аллоҳ) сизлар учун қулоқ(лар)ни, кўзларни ва дилларни пайдо қилган Зотдир. Сизлар эса камдан-кам шукр қилурсизлар.
arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَنشَأَ لَكُمُ ٱلسَّمۡعَ وَٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرَ وَٱلۡأَفۡـِٔدَةَۚ قَلِيلٗا مَّا تَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: Uzbek translation - Alauddin Mansour
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Alauddin Mansour, printed in 1430 H. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wahuwa alladhī ansha-a lakumu al-samʿa wal-abṣāra wal-afidata qalīlan mā tashkurūna
